org.apache.drill.exec.memory

Class RootAllocator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.drill.exec.memory.Accountant
      • org.apache.drill.exec.memory.BaseAllocator
        • org.apache.drill.exec.memory.RootAllocator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, BufferAllocator

    public class RootAllocator
extends BaseAllocator
    The root allocator for using direct memory inside a Drillbit. Supports creating a tree of descendant child allocators.
